original_title: Rescatar saberes - O futuro é das cabras
overview: Oliver Laxe brings us closer to his immediate world: To Vilela, where he tries to raise his vital project while reflecting on spirituality, the simple and the symbolic, on the soil on which our future is rooted. The return to the primary sector is a metaphor for how to take care of the landscape and let us take care of it.
title: Rescatar saberes - O futuro é das cabras
